Topics.Title: Creating a new file
Instructions: Go to File Menu > New File. A new tab will be opened.
Alternatively, you can do Ctrl+N (Control and N key together).

Topics.Title: Opening a new file
Instructions: Go to File Menu > Open File. A file chooser dialog will appear.
Select the file you want to open using the file chooser dialog. The file will be opened on a new tab

Topics.Title: Opening a directory
Instructions: Go to File Menu > Open Directory. A file chooser dialog will appear.
Select the directory you want to open using the file chooser dialog. The directory tree will be added to the project trees at the left.

Topics.Title: Save
Instructions: If the file hasn't been saved yet, a Save As dialog box will appear allowing you to provide a name this file before saving it.

Topics.Title: Save As
Instructions: Go to File Menu > Save As.
A Save As dialog box will appear, allowing you to provide a name this file before saving it.

Topics.Title: Restart
Instructions: Go to File Menu > Restart. This closes the application.
Wait for Winter to start again.
